_source.text: 27-year-old Rutherford, who clinched a surprise gold in the long jump in London, will hope to go one better than he managed in the last Commonwealth Games in Delhi where he picked a silver medal.

_source.text: After gold and silver yesterday, Italy completed an hat-trick of medals by taking the bronze in this race, thanks to national champion Vincenzo Nibali , who set a time of 28'56"36, more than 4 seconds better than the one of race favorite Thomas Dekker (Holland - 29'00"55).
